content: Real estate investment trust Medical Properties Trust Inc  said on Monday it would buy privately held Capella Holdings Inc  owner of hospital operator Capella Healthcare Inc  for $900 million in cash.
name: Medical Properties Trust Inc
title: Medical Properties to buy private hospital operator for $900 million

content: July 27 Real estate investment trust Medical Properties Trust Inc said on Monday it would buy privately held Capella Holdings Inc  owner of hospital operator Capella Healthcare Inc  for $900 million in cash.
name: Medical Properties Trust Inc
title: UPDATE 1-Medical Properties to buy private hospital operator for $900 mln
